en.about_content:
SlotPlanner

Version: {version}

Description: Weekly Schedule Optimizer


A desktop application for intelligent weekly time slot planning using constraint optimization.

Designed to assign children to available teachers or therapists based on preferences, availability, tandem rules, and other constraints.


Features:

  • 45-minute time slots with 15-minute raster
  • Teacher and child availability management
  • Tandem scheduling (pairs of children)
  • Configurable optimization weights
  • PDF export for weekly schedules

License: MIT

en.tooltip_reset_weights: Reset all optimization weights to their default values

en.tooltip_save_weights_default: Save current weights as default values for new projects
en.tooltip_data_storage_directory: Directory where JSON data files are stored
en.tooltip_pdf_export_directory: Directory where PDF exports are saved
en.tooltip_reset_storage_paths: Reset storage paths to absolute default locations
en.tooltip_select_preferred_teachers: Select preferred teachers (Ctrl+click for multiple selection)

en.tooltip_delete_schedule_result: Delete the selected schedule result permanently

de.about_content:
SlotPlanner

Version: {version}

Beschreibung: Wochenstundenplan-Optimierer


Eine Desktop-Anwendung f√ºr intelligente w√∂chentliche Zeitfensterplanung mit Constraint-Optimierung.

Entwickelt, um Kinder verf√ºgbaren Lehrkr√§ften oder Therapeuten zuzuordnen basierend auf Pr√§ferenzen, Verf√ºgbarkeit, Tandem-Regeln und anderen Einschr√§nkungen.


Funktionen:

  • 45-Minuten-Zeitfenster mit 15-Minuten-Raster
  • Verwaltung der Lehrkraft- und Kindverf√ºgbarkeit
  • Tandem-Planung (Paare von Kindern)
  • Konfigurierbare Optimierungsgewichtungen
  • PDF-Export f√ºr Wochenstundenpl√§ne

Lizenz: MIT
